website_summaries.verdict: The Onitsuka Tiger Colorado 85 has an eye-catching, old-school cool design. Its cut makes the feet look sleeker, and its true-to-size fit allows people to wear them comfortably for long periods.It is also flexible enough for different seasons. It is a see a very well-made and good-looking shoe.
pros: According to many who’ve worn the Onitsuka Tiger Colorado Eighty-Fives, the shoes are very comfortable for everyday use
Plenty of purchasers love the throwback style and eye-catching design of the low-top sneakers
A lot of users report getting compliments on their shoes, even from total strangers
A good number of people have commended the perfect fit of Onitsuka Tiger by Asics’ Colorado Eighty-Five sneakers
Several buyers say that these casual low-tops from Onitsuka Tiger are priced fairly
A handful of customers are pleased with the wide array of color choices the Onitsuka model has
The quality of Onitsuka Tiger Colorado 85s is top-notch, and the shoes are very well-made, some testers have reported
The shoes are versatile according to a few customers who have remarked that the sneakers are not too bulky for summer but warm enough for winter
A couple of people have stated that Onitsuka Tiger Colorado Eighty-Five fashion sneakers are lightweight footwear that will function well for running or walking
cons: A few people have reported that some of the Onitsuka Tiger Colorado 85s’ colorways don’t look exactly as pictured
The lifestyle sneakers don’t offer much in the way of padding or arch support, some buyers have complained
According to a couple of users, the back of the shoes where they meet the wearer’s heels are very stiff

customer_reviews.title: Duffle is green
customer_reviews.text: delivered promptly. true to size, i am 7.5 for men's shoe size, and i normally wear 8.5-9 in women's. like other onitsuka tiger colorado 85, it was a well constructed comfortable urban pair of sneakers. i ordered the duffle and white, but had to return it. in the pictures i thought it was grayish, but when i received it, it was actually green. i ddnt take a star off of this because it was still a nice pair of shoes, it just so happens that it appeared differently online, and it wasnt the color i needed. all in all i recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joon, OH

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, this is the second pair I've owned in a row. They're perfect for dads. I don't run every day but it helps to have something semi-athletic already on when your toddler goes tearing off towards the wrong end of the park. The fuzzy part (base color) tends to get pilly/shaggy over time but they otherwise hold up very well, lasting half again as long as most pairs of shoes I've bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Great brand.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, good support, and look great. The tread is unique and grips well, almost too well on some surfaces. I'm a big fan. Update: had them over a year now. They are even more comfortable now that they are broken in. The tread has held up well even with average use. Nothing has come unglued or frayed (like some other brands do). I'm very very happy with them. Will be ordering more just to make sure I have an extra pair!
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Classy, Comfortable, and Supportive.
customer_reviews.text: I love Onitsuka Tiger's. I have found certain pairs to be a little too thin and unsupportive so I am pretty picky about the ones I do buy – they need to have support on the heel in particular. I was particularly pleased with my pair of Colorado's – they had plenty of support, fit great and looked great, and were very comfortable. These are on my list of regulars along with the Onitsuka Tiger Temp Racers.
customer_reviews.author: Chong Chong

customer_reviews.title: Color is gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: The blue is awesome with the grey and these are one of the most comfortable pair of kicks I've ever owned. People always compliment me on these because they are pretty throw-back. Love them. Would buy so many more pairs if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Looking to buy again
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking shoes for a great price, but beware....These are not for running or any activity that requires solid construction. Upon arrival, rip out the insoles and put in new ones - you will be happy you did. The suede outside looks great and hasn't shown any signs of poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Leto

customer_reviews.title: Classic Style!  Fit true to size!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these shoes! They have a great classic look and lots of color options. You can have one to match every outfit if that's what you wanted. They fit as expected. It is hard to find my true size of 12.5 in a store and these just happened to have that size. Gotta love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: BLUE ELEPHANT

customer_reviews.title: Length and width of the shoes were great, though
customer_reviews.text: There wasn't as much room (height-wise, of all things) for my toes, and the material on top of them wasn't stretchy enough to make room for them. Length and width of the shoes were great, though. Unfortunately my toes were just kind of smashed in the front. My other Onitsukas were more roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Richman

customer_reviews.title: Seem defective
customer_reviews.text: What is a while ago, I still wear them regularly however there was inconsistencies in the fabric from one shoe to the other. Seem like they have been sitting for awhile and possibly dried out and the material was a bit compromised. One shoe was definitely different in the other field slightly enough that my daughter asked me what I did to my shoe..
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Sweeeet
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because of the colors. Always getting compliments. I rather buy shoes nobody has and stand out in the crowd.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: They're Ok
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned Tigers, I usually buy the traditional running Asics. I have several pair and absolutely love them. These are more for casual dress to wear for a few hours. I like to give my sneakers the NYC test. When I visit NY I take the subway or walk 98% of the time. These would absolutely not stand up to that test.
customer_reviews.author: T. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Love at first step
customer_reviews.text: Searched for weeks for a walking shoe that was supportive and comfortable for walks to and from work on uneven city pavement and these fit the bill. Normal size is 8-8.5 so the 8 fits perfectly. No shin splints after walking to work as well as street festivals for 5+ hours. Material is tan/linen like so it goes well with every color.
customer_reviews.author: Bahati Banks

customer_reviews.title: Really cool shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! They are so cool and really comfortable so far. I've only had them for about a week, but have walked around in them a lot and worked out in them too and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jaclynk2

customer_reviews.title: They look like the 1985 as well!
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite shoes! I've also got a pair of the high top version as well. They are nice quality and seem like they will hold up for a long time. I'm actually getting ready to order another pair in a different color. The outsole is made of a really sticky/ grippy rubber, very sure footed.
customer_reviews.author: Klrlvr

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price. Wish there were more color options!
customer_reviews.text: These seem like really good shoes. The color I had wanted was not available, but for the price these are really good. I haven't worn them a whole lot yet, so I can't say for sure how long they might last. That being said, they are comfy and I look forward to wearing them more often once its not so wet outside.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Love these kicks but the arch was much thinner than ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these kicks but the arch was much thinner than on my other Onitsuka's. Too narrow for my flat foot so sadly i had ti return it. But if your not flat footed, this shoe rocks. I almost kept them anyway. :/ See to have seen them go.
customer_reviews.author: #thereal_ochocinco

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. The brand is high quality. My 2nd pair of onitsuka tigers. Fit good and support my flat feet very well. Sister company "Ascics" also make a great shoe. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Dukette

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit as expected but vendor fixed that ASAP!
customer_reviews.text: I immediately sent it back for the next size up which fit perfectly. No issues with the exchange at all and it was very fast. Love the little detailing on the shoe that doesn't come through so well in the pics. I will probably buy another pair to keep fresh for when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Science, Fantasy, & History fan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes they're confortable. I can use them for work. They were sent and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Bernal

customer_reviews.title: Hip, fresh, crisp and colorful
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes, probably ever. I own them in 4 color combinations. I want to hoard them in case they stop making them or change the pattern or something. Comfortable, hip, great colors, great materials, fresh, unique, not too flashy just old school cool.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Smith

customer_reviews.title: Unique and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are black and burgundy leather, which is very unique. They are comfortable and dress up the casual look. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you're wavering, pull the trigger
customer_reviews.text: Fresh to death. Super comfy and retro 90s style. I wish I had every color. Alas, I'm not a sneaker head and these are for work. I wear daily for such but they have made their way into my outside work stylings, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh K

customer_reviews.title: bad moisture absorbance
customer_reviews.text: bad for winter time. too much moisture created due to bad absorbance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe; good price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Just a tad smaller than expected, but still comfortable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Chernick

customer_reviews.title: These are green and not grey
customer_reviews.text: To me in the pictures the duffel bag color looked grey, but it's dark green. So I give those pictures 1 star. These have more cushion and are much more comfortable than the Mexico 66 or Ultimate 81. But they are not as low profile and are more like a regular sneaker than a trainer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Funnell

customer_reviews.title: Wicked comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I drift between 11 1/2 to 12 1/2 but call myself a 12. Went with 12 1/2 and glad I did. I've got just a whisper of too much room at the toe but that's actually how I where my shoes. These look and feel awesome. I'm glad I bought 2 pairs (different colors).
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great and lasted 1 1/2 years as my main getting around footwear. Looking at getting another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Deisher

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and stylish. I love Asics as a whole and this shoe is no different. I am a size 8 and it fits as expected. I'm pregnant now and my feet have swollen a tad but they are still very comfortable, a bit snug, but comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sayed Family

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sweet sneakers. I have had many pairs and never a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: tyler axelson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: Our family such a fan of Onitsuka Tiger shoes! Love the variety of colors & most impressed with the comfort & color of these ones!

customer_reviews.title: I don't love the skinny laces they come with
customer_reviews.text: I do think the sizing is closer to men's now that I have reordered them. I normally wear a women's 8.5. I ordered the 7.5 and they are still a little big, but I'm going to keep them cuz they're comfy! I also want to buy some solid color laces. I don't love the skinny laces they come with.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, look good
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, fit like a New Balance, a lot taller than I expected them to be.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I'm a female and wear a women's size 6, so I ordered a Men's size 4.5 and they fit great. Love the colors & the design. They're comfortable, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shaymazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the shoes. Comfortable, light and sturdy. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Onitsuka Tiger delivers a great shoe. The only gripe I have is that ...
customer_reviews.text: As always, Onitsuka Tiger delivers a great shoe. The only gripe I have is that the color online looks to be completely black and grey. However, when I got the shoe, the the section by your ankle is actually more of a camo green color. Not too bad when wearing shorts, but the contrast against blue jeans doesn't look so good in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the shoes, they fit perfectly and they were sent and arrived well packaged and quickly. Thanks and blessings, Rod

customer_reviews.title: A very nice fashionable shoe
customer_reviews.text: A very nice fashionable shoe. Suggested to go down a half size by Amazon fit. It ended up being a great fit.

customer_reviews.title: It's really a nice pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: It's really a nice pair of shoes. Very well made and comfortable and beautiful style,not too thick.Size is just right.Perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable sneakers!

customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these shoes. I'll be buying more colors.

customer_reviews.title: First thing is to loose the insoles that are in ...
customer_reviews.text: First thing is to loose the insoles that are in them, and get a ones that have a little cushioning.from there they are pure comfort all day. They are as I remember them. Second pair to be ordered shortly.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable shoes I have. Now I know every ones feet are different. So a shoe that is comfortable for one person. May not be for another. Like many people stand by Nike shoes around here, but every night walking, running, and cross training shoe that I have tried hurt my feet after a couple of hours. These shoes are cheaper than those. They are made by a well known company, and they are very comfortable. I find that I wear them more than any of my other shoes because I can wear them all day.

customer_reviews.title: I find that the back heel holder is super stiff. It doesn't rub
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7 in women's and the 5.5 men's that is the corresponding size is not true to size, but it doesn't pose any major problems for me. I find that the back heel holder is super stiff. It doesn't rub, but it is not flexible and doesn't mold to your personal heel. Also, this shoe starts off very, very stiff, but definitely breaks in. Do not buy these shoes if you are looking for a comfortable pair to work in. I will not be repurchasing even though they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for me to wear all day long

customer_reviews.text: Love how they look, but the sizing is too large! My feet are a bit wide, almost flat. but the shoe never lost its form and I really really love the colors and retro design; obviously not for runners but they do a good job if you have to walk a lot. I returned my 7's and I'm waiting for my new pair to arrive.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed about the insole change
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes except for one thing... they've changed the insole. The insole used to be removable but now it's glued in. Being able to use custom insoles made the shoes very comfortable, now they're just your normal Onitsukas. I quit wearing the ultimate 81 bc of the glue in insole and it looks like I'll have to deal with the same thing in the Colorado. Bummer b/c these were my favorite sneakers. Switch back to removable insoles Onitsuka!
customer_reviews.author: mscot

customer_reviews.title: Neato shoes but sizing a little confusing.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these shoes look but their sizing is a bit confusing. I had to send back the first ones I got as they were several sizes too small. There sizing goes by unisex so make sure to figure out before ordering. But returning shoes was quite easy and also was refunded promptly.

product_meta.title: Onitsuka Tiger Mens Colorado Eighty-Five-U Colorado Eighty-Five
product_meta.description: Onitsuka's Tiger Colorado Eighty-Five fashion sneaker summons retro vibes while delivering modern performance. Leather and mesh upper. Rubber sole.
feature_bullets: Rubber Outsole: The agressively lugged rubber outsole is beefed up to explore rugged terrain with its deep flex canals.
Premium Materials: The vintage upper has been reformed with premium design materials, such as leather and denim, presenting them with a rugged, sophisticated, and fashion-forward vibe.
Mesh Heel Collar: Finishing off this shoe is the elite mesh heel collar, provding not only extreme comfort, but enhanced breathability for great climate control during all-day wear.
